chapter.info: The anthology this chapter is published in must be registered in advance

contributors.confirm_remove_affiliation_text: Are you sure you want to remove this affiliation?
contributors.confirm_remove_author_text: Are you sure you want to remove {{contributorName}} from list of authors?

description.npi_disciplines: Scientific field in Norwegian publication indicator
description.keywords_helper: Separate keywords with commas or enter

feedback.minimum_one_contributor: You need to have at least one author registered for this registration
feedback.minimum_one_file: You need to have at least one file uploaded for this registration

files_and_license.administrative_contract: Author agreement or other file to be saved but not published
files_and_license.no_duplicates: Cannot add "{{fileName}}", because a file with the same name already exists
files_and_license.title: File name

public_page.current_validation_errors: NB! The registration has validation errors that must be fixed before it can be published
public_page.request_doi_description: When you request a DOI (Digital Object Identifier), the order will go through a curator at your institution for quality control. Add a message in case of any questions or clarifications. You will receive an email when the request has been evaluated.

registration.no_published_registrations_yet: There are no published registrations yet
registration.start_with_link_to_resource: Link to original version if the resource already has been published on the Internet with a DOI
registration.start_with_uploading_file: Upload file if the resource is to be published on the Internet for the first time

references.delete_doi_text: Removing the link to the publication will change it from a registration to a new publication. Do you want to continue?
references.is_book_a_textbook_confirm: Yes, the book is a textbook
references.is_not_peer_reviewed: The registration is not peer reviewed
references.nvi_success: This registration can be included in the Norwegian Science Index
references.nvi_fail_not_rated:
This registration can not be included in the Norwegian Science Index (NSI), since selected journal is not at level 1 or 2. 

(The journal's level may be changed, so the registration can be included in NSI)
references.nvi_fail_no_peer_review: This registration can not be incuded in the Norwegian Science Index, since it's not peer reviewed.
references.series_info: If the publication is part of a series

support_description: When you request support your message will be sent to a curator at your institution. You can see responses at <0>My Messages</0>.
modal_unsaved_changes_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
